concept.title: 18.116 Service-disabled Veteran-owned Small Business (SDVOSB) sole source awards.

conbody.p: Contracts may be awarded to Service-disabled Veteran-owned Small Business (SDVOSB) concerns on a sole source basis. (See 19.1406.)
